content: now you can make this cute and easy amigurumi mouse these mice are perfect as a cat toy or for children they would also add some extra cutness to your amigurumi collection the pattern is easy to follow and includes pictures to help you finish the mouse the amigurumi mouse is made in continuous rounds and you need to know basic stitches like single_crochet magic_ring and single_crochet decreases if you have any questions just ask this pattern has been tested by 4 different individual testers
